description:
Get in and drive! car2go provides its members on-demand access to more than 12,400 vehicles in 29 global cities, spanning from Brooklyn to Seattle in the U.S., from Montreal to Vancouver in Canada and from Berlin to Milan in Europe. car2go is a one-way car sharing service, allowing members to pick up a vehicle at one location in the city and drop it off at their destination. No need to make a reservation, round-trip or worry about late fees. Gas, insurance and parking are included with the cost of your one-time membership fee.

Using our app, you can find and access the nearest available car2go, providing you with a cutting-edge mobility solution at your fingertips. 

Key app features include:

•	Display of all vehicles available for use in your city and across the globe
•	Seamless reservation system, allowing you to make a reservation 30 minutes in advance of a trip
•	Automatic route guidance to the nearest car2go
•	Important vehicle information, including estimated distance to nearest car2go, street address where car2go is located, interior/exterior condition of each vehicle and fuel gauge or charge state for each car2go 
•	Ability to open a car2go using your smart phone
•	Display of all car2go designated parking spaces and “Home Areas” for each city
•	Catalog of all trips, including departure/destination address and cost for each trip
•	Radar functionality that sends a push notification when an available car2go is close by 
•	And a bunch of other cool options that make car2go a leader in mobility solutions

Interested in joining our other 850,000+ members? Register online now at www.car2go.com.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

car2go is available in the following cities:

• Europe: Berlin, Düsseldorf, Frankfurt, Hamburg, Copenhagen, Cologne, Munich, Stuttgart, Ulm / Neu-Ulm, Milan, Rome, Florence, Amsterdam and Vienna 

• North America: Austin, Columbus, Denver, Miami, Minneapolis / St. Paul, Portland, San Diego, Washington DC, Seattle, Toronto, Vancouver, Calgary, L.A. (South Bay), Montreal and Brooklyn

If you have any questions or suggestions regarding the app, please contact us at app@car2go.com.
releaseNotes:
This car2go app update features an all-new design and will allow you to begin a car2go trip using your smartphone (without having to use your member card). As a car2go member, you will now have the option to open a car2go using the app OR using your member card.  We’ve also made ending trips easier, with our new end trip feature.

Enjoy a more flexible and convenient way to use car2go with this latest app update!

We also fixed the issue that iOS 8 users were not able to set a car2go radar.
